column5: A description for each photo isn't really necessary, as the good stuff has been said before in earlier posts.  As you can see, it was a wonderful day on Simcoe, with robins' egg skies, almost no breeze, and temperatures that rose to the freezing mark.  It was tremendous to meet  up again with old friends and share some stories, lies, and laughs.                                                It was an honour to be  part of Maureen's annual do once again, and to be part of this great group of folks.
Good to see everyone had a great time. Good to see your doing well too douG!! Hopefully I will be able to make it there next year.  Rob C
Amazing pics Doug!!!   Thanks for posting those!
thanks for sharing the pics with us!
Thnaks for the great pics, it looks like everyone had a great time. Nice to see the media coverage for such a great cause.
Thsoe are some GREAT pics douG, thanks for sharing!!!!  Maureen
Nice Doug, wish I could have made it on Saturday. Looks like a lot of fun!
Very nice pictures DouG, thanks for sharing them.  Joey
nice pictures doug....it was nice to see you again .....it was good to see some old friends again also..
Great shots DouG. Hey, who's the funny looking guy kneeling on the ice, praying to the fishing Gods ?
